Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.EXPLANATION: Percentage or score indicating the achievement of set goals to reduce environmental impact through operational practices.
Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.FORMULA: (Number of Environmental Impact Reduction Goals Achieved / Total Number of Environmental Impact Reduction Goals) * 100

Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.EXPLANATION: Degree to which the organization complies with local, national, and international environmental regulations.
Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.FORMULA: (Number of Regulatory Compliance Checks Passed / Total Number of Regulatory Compliance Checks) * 100

Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.EXPLANATION: Rate of reduction in carbon emissions per unit of output or activity.

Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.KPIS: Energy consumption per unit of output.
Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.EXPLANATION: Average energy consumed per unit of production output or activity.
Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.FORMULA: Total Energy Consumption / Total Units of Output

Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.EXPLANATION: Total cost savings achieved through improved waste management practices.
Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.FORMULA: (Previous Waste Disposal Costs - Current Waste Disposal Costs) / Previous Waste Disposal Costs * 100

Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.EXPLANATION: Frequency of incidents or violations related to environmental regulations or policies.
Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.FORMULA: (Number of Environmental Incidents / Total Number of Environmental Events) * 100

Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.EXPLANATION: Improvement in efficiency measured by reduced water usage per unit of output or activity.
Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.FORMULA: (Previous Water Usage Efficiency - Current Water Usage Efficiency) / Previous Water Usage Efficiency * 100

Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.KPIS: Percentage of products meeting eco-label standards.
Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.EXPLANATION: Percentage of products manufactured or sourced meeting recognized eco-label standards.
Corporate+Sustainability+Environmental I.FORMULA: (Number of Eco-Label Compliant Products / Total Number of Products) * 100
